explanation: A space-cat boss fight set against a deep cosmic backdrop. The boss, "Cosmo the Furious," is a composite geometric cat shape rendered in hot pink/magenta — a rounded square body, triangular ears, slit-pupil eyes, and sweeping curved tail arcs. The player glows in cool aquamarine against the near-black starfield. The level opens with a slow buildup of drifting star polygons and a planet ring set-piece, then escalates into frenzied paw-swipe arcs, claw-scratch line bursts, and spinning spikeball clusters on the heavy beats. The chorus/drop sections flood the screen with simultaneous paw slams (3–5 objects per beat), while calmer inter-sections use sparse half-note star drifts to let the player breathe. All hazards are procedural vector geometry: circles for spikeballs and planets, polygons for stars and claws, arcs/rotated rectangles for scratches and paw swipes.
